body.text: {rate:0.1}In a detective's office somewhere...

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Sigh...

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: I became a detective since all the movies and books made them seem cool... but this job is {rate:0.2}SO BORING.

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: I hope something exciting happens around here sometime soon...
{text_sfx_off}{sfx:door jingle}{rate:0}*DING*

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Is that a client?! Maybe god heard my plees and decided to give me something exciting!

body.speaker: Old Man
body.text: Hello I saw a flier for this place... is this Fran's Detective Agency?

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Why yes! Is there anything I can help you with today?{rate:0.5}{rate:0.01}Perhaps a murder{rate:0.5}...{rate:0.02} {sfx:bam}Or a phantom thief is on the loose??

body.speaker: Old Man
body.text: My poor pooch has ran away while I was taking him on a walk in the forest, and I'm afraid I need help finding him...

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Well, I suppose this is what I should have expected.

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Can you tell me what the dog looks like and where in the forest you lost them?

body.speaker: Old man
body.text: Pooch has pointy ears and has a silly high pitched bark that is distinct from other dogs. He ran off around{rate:0.5}... {rate:0.05}here in the forest during our walk

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Great. I suppose I don't have much else to do right now so I might as well start searching now...

body.speaker: Old Man
body.text: Oh thank you so much! I hope pooch is safe, poor boy...

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Ugh, this place is a maze. How on earth am I going to find anything in this place?
{sfx:woof}woof!

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: That must be the dog!

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: I definitely heard the sound coming from{rate: 0.5}...{rate:0.02}this way!

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Surely it's not{rate:0.06}...{rate:0.03} here?{rate:1}{rate:0.03}In this dangerous looking cave?
{sfx:woof} woof!

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Ah shoot it is coming from that cave{rate:0.5}...{rate:0.03} {sfx:bam}Ah screw it!{rate:0.5}{rate:0.03} I'm sure it'll just be a quick trip in and out...

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Wh-where am I??

body.speaker: Dog
body.text: {pan:dog}{sfx:woof}woof!

body.speaker: hide
body.text: {action:dog_run_right}{hide:1}{next_line}

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: {pan:fran}{sfx:bam}H-Hey, come back here!

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Ugh, finally caught up to you you dumb mutt...

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Now come here so I can get out of he-

body.speaker: Dog
body.text: {pan:hank}{sfx:woof}woof!

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Wh-who are you?

body.speaker: Hank
body.text: {pan:Hank}Name's Hank{rate:0.5}...{rate:0.03}and that should be my question, what do you think you're doing barging into my home like this??

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: I'm here to take that dog back!

body.speaker: Hank
body.text: {sfx:bam}You want to take pooch from me?? Over my dead body!

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: So you took the dog huh?{rate:0.5}{rate:0.03}In that case I guess I just have to beat you up and bring the dog back to its rightful owner!

body.speaker: Hank
body.text: Hmm? I see that you've managed to steal my {rate:0.015}limited-edition-magical-girl-transformation-staff{rate:0.03} somehow!

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: This thing is yours?!

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: ...Hold on how come you even have something like this?

body.speaker: Hank
body.text: {rate:0.015}{sfx:bam}H-Hey who said it was mine!?

body.speaker: Hank
body.text: Hmph, no matter, I'll show you what me and pooch can do. Get her pooch!

body.speaker: Dog
body.text: {sfx:woof}woof! woof!

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: *Sigh*{rate:0.5}{rate:0.03} here we go...

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Phew, that was tough...

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Alright you rowdy mutt, let's finally get you back to your owner.

body.speaker: Dog
body.text: {sfx:woof} woof!

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Hey old man, I got your dog back for you!

body.speaker: Old man
body.text: Huh?

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Man you wouldn't BELIEVE what I had to go through to find old pooch here.{rate:0.5} {rate:0.01}I heard them barking in a dark cave in the forest where I eventually reached HELL of all places, where I found a magical staff that let me tackle my enemies where I had to chase after the dumb dog until I found the perpetrator whole stole pooch and took him down and took pooch with m-

body.speaker: Old Man
body.text: Err, I don't know how to say this...

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Oh you don't have to thank me, I actually kinda had fun exploring the place. Though it might cost you a liiiiiittle extr-

body.speaker: Old Man
body.text: ...Pooch actually returned home while you were out looking for him.{rate:0.5}{rate:0.03} The dog you came back with... isn't my pooch.

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: So what you're saying is...

body.speaker: Old Man
body.text: Yes that dog is actually...

body.speaker: Hank
body.text: She took Cerebus...

body.speaker: Hank
body.text: ...{rate:0.015}And my limited-edition-magical-girl-transformation-staff{rate:0.03}...
{rate:0.5}THE (BAD) END
